@NoExcuses, that does make sense. I did try to use this after windows was detected to not be genuine. I will re-arm windows and try it again.

FYI for those of you who shudder at the thought of doing a "clean install", you can use something like Windows 7 Toolkit to remove any and all activation cracks you have on your PC. 
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5011417/windows_7_toolkit_1.8_by_Orbit30_Activate_your_build_7600

I believe the activator out there by "SK" lets you Re-Arm windows too

In my experience, you can "re-arm" with any old appz, but you will ALWAYS want to use the latest and greatest activator

I'll try this and post results later

does exactly what its supposed to do. downloaded file after new install of windows 7, followed instructions and i'm all good. not a single hint that my windows may not be geniune. thanks for the upload!
